headers.subject: [tosdr:2349] [bad] tinkercad might use your data for direct marketing

html:
Apparently, it only does this if you consent to this. I couldn't find a way to opt either in or out, though.

"Furthermore, the personal data may be used for the purposes of direct marketing, provided that You have consented to this, as well as for investigation and follow up in cases of misuse."

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: [bad] tinkercad might use your data for direct marketing
text:
Apparently, it only does this if you consent to this. I couldn't find a way 
to opt either in or out, though.

"Furthermore, the personal data may be used for the purposes of direct 
marketing, provided that You have consented to this, as well as for 
investigation and follow up in cases of misuse."

--
